docs.title: Waleed Ahmed
docs.text:
Aspiring Data Scientist | AI & Automation Enthusiast

Welcome to my portfolio 👋 I am a data science student with a strong interest in AI, machine learning, and automation systems. This site showcases my skills, learning journey, and future projects.

📍 Pakistan 📧 Email:wa9345253@gmail.com

docs.title: About Me
docs.text:
I come from a non-technical background, which taught me how to learn complex concepts step by step.

My journey into Data Science and AI started with curiosity about how intelligent systems work and how automation can solve real-world problems.

docs.title: What drives me
docs.text:
• Building practical AI solutions
  • Learning by doing
  • Continuous improvement

docs.title: Goals
docs.text:
• Become a skilled data scientist
  • Work on real-world AI products
  • Build systems that create real impact

docs.title: Fun fact
docs.text: I enjoy breaking complex problems into simple logical steps.

docs.title: Blog & Insights
docs.text: ✍️ I plan to regularly write about my learning journey in data science and AI.

docs.title: Upcoming topics
docs.text:
• How I started learning Data Science
  • What I learned from building my first ML model
  • Understanding RAG in simple terms
  • Common mistakes beginners make in AI

Writing helps me learn better and share knowledge with the community.
